#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int z[2002000], arr1[1001000], arr2[1001000];

void z_function(string s) {
    int n = s.length();
    memset(z, 0, sizeof(z));
    z[0] = n;
    for (int i = 1, l = 0, r = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if (i <= r)
            z[i] = min (r - i + 1, z[i - l]);
        while (i + z[i] < n && s[z[i]] == s[i + z[i]])
            z[i]++;
        if (i + z[i] - 1 > r)
            l = i, r = i + z[i] - 1;
    }
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int tc = 0;
	while(t--){
		tc++;
		string str1, str2;
		cin>>str1>>str2;
		int len = str1.length();
		string str;
		str = str2 + '#' + str1;
		z_function(str);
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
			arr1[i] = z[i+len+1];
		str = str1 + '#' + str2;
		z_function(str);
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
			arr2[i] = z[i+len+1];
		/*for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
			cout<<arr1[i]<<" ";
		cout<<"\n";
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
			cout<<arr2[i]<<" ";
		cout<<"\n";*/
		int ans = INT_MIN;
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++){
			int k = arr1[i];
			if(arr2[k] >= i){
				ans = max(ans, i + k);
			}
		}
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++){
			int k = arr2[i];
			if(arr1[k] >= i){
				ans = max(ans, i + k);
			}
		}
		printf("Case %d: %d\n", tc, ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
